TopicTitle: (help) How to install addons in mac os x

Articles.Content: Im a pc guy but my friend recently discovered ksp and has a mac. He asked me to install some addons for him. I opened up the downloaded folder and there was only the ksp icon and the readme. No parts folder. How would I install addons in os x?

context click on the KSP icon and select show package contents

you can make alias of the 'parts', 'spacecraft' and 'screenshots' folders and move them to the parent folder so the individual folders will be easier to access.
so right click on the ksp icon? How do i unzip folders in os x

right click with a 2 button mouse, or control + click.

The mac should have Archive Utility built in, just double click on the .zip file

If it's a .rar, you need to download something like UnRarX which will open (and join if necessary) .rar files
